SEARCH
Package microsim.simulation.component

Class Bus

java.lang.Object
microsim.simulation.component.SimulationComponent
microsim.simulation.component.Bus
public class Bus extends SimulationComponent
Represents a communication bus for a simulation. A bus is comprised of:
  • A 32 bit address line.
  • A 32 bit data line.
  • Control lines (active high):
    • Read enable line.
    • Write enable line.
    • A byte select line with states:
      1. Byte.
      2. Half.
      3. Word.
Lines are implemented by TSLine objects, modeling 3-state logic. Only int lines are defined for performance reasons, byte selection is done through an enum class, while booleans use the usual 0 = false, 1 = true convention.
